titles.title: Jesus is the Answer - Michael Sowers ; Tim Coy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have walked alone in life for far too long
so i will reach out my hand to Father God alone
I have come through many miles of darkened road,
And I will gladly let the Lord shoulder the load.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
'Cause Jesus is the answer to all life's questions,
and He will never leave me alone
I'm reaching out to Jesus as my Saviour,
And i will serve the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
God is grace and God is love he guides my every step
he leads me down a holy road into righteousness
He burns away the sinful man in His holy flame
He cleanses me with his power in His mighty name
